short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-downvote all posts and comments on https://www.reddit.com/r/The_Donald

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every time you happen to stumble on the r/The_Donald subreddit or a post within the subreddit, the extension will auto-down vote each and every post or comment. Saving you time, energy and nerves!

IMPORTANT: The mods at the r/The_Donald have changed the theme of the subreddit to completely hide the down-vote arrows and with that eliminating the option to express any disagreement. In order to see the option to down-vote and use this extension, please go to your Reddit preference page (www.reddit.com/prefs/) and de-active "display options" -> "allow subreddits to show me custom themes". OTHERWISE THIS EXTENSION WON'T WORK FOR YOU.

Disclaimer: By installing and using the "Down the Donald" extension, you agree that you are using this extension at your own risk. The developer of this extension takes no responsibility of your usage of Reddit and their User Agreement and site rules.
